zone.line: lived but in the 4 lamentations of those who
had felt, but had survived thier influence;
even from these it they was were speedily effaced.
Accumulations of wealth & power were
inordinately great. The most abject of
mankind, freedmen, eunuchs, & every species
of satellite attendant on the a court
became invested with inexhaustible resources.
The The consequences of this system speedily
accurately
became manifest, & thier they were pernicious
corresponded to the
pernicious character of thier cause. Refinement
in arts & letters unnaturally distorted from
its natural tendency to promote benevolence
& truth, became subservient to lust &
luxury. All communication among human
beings was vitiated & polluted in its sources.
The prosperity of the republic no longer excited
disinterested care. Men The intercourse
